ixa.kaflib

Class Chunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • ixa.kaflib.Chunk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Chunk
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Chunks are noun, verb or prepositional phrases, spanning terms.
    See Also:
